title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a web-based application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML that helps users monitor and manage their sleep debt. This project allows users to log their sleep patterns and visualize their accumulated sleep debt over time, promoting better sleep hygiene and overall well-being. It serves as a practical example of utilizing TypeScript in a front-end project.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, serves as a hands-on project exploring various aspects of finance. It leverages Python's data analysis and visualization capabilities to investigate financial data, perform calculations, and potentially build basic financial models. The project focuses on practical application and aims to demonstrate how Python can be used to gain insights from financial datasets.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack web application built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI) leveraging the pages router. It serves as a project management tool utilizing React Query for efficient data fetching and management. This repository demonstrates modern web development practices, focusing on a clean, maintainable architecture and a rich user experience, covering topics such as state management, UI component libraries, and TypeScript best practices within a Next.js environment.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed as a dynamic platform for brainstorming and organizing ideas. This interactive web application allows users to create, visualize, and manage their ideas in a clear and collaborative manner, fostering a productive environment for project planning and development.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard project, built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, provides a web-based interface for monitoring and managing fleets of robots. It allows users to visualize robot status, track task progress, and interact with robot systems through a user-friendly dashboard, making it an essential tool for robotic operations and management.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: Ros-log-viewer is a project providing a user-friendly web interface, built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and shell scripting, for analyzing and visualizing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This tool simplifies the debugging and monitoring of ROS-based systems by offering an intuitive way to filter, search, and interpret log data.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to facilitate seamless and secure voting processes. This project utilizes cutting-edge web technologies to offer a user-friendly interface and robust backend functionality, making it a practical solution for various voting scenarios while demonstrating best practices in full-stack web development.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing a modern dashboard implementation with Next.js. This repository demonstrates best practices for building dynamic user interfaces and provides a foundation for creating scalable and maintainable web applications with a focus on front-end development. It's a valuable resource for learning about Next.js, TypeScript, and dashboard design.

description: Raven v2 is a project built with TypeScript and JavaScript, aiming to [insert a concise description of the project's main purpose based on the README or your knowledge]. It leverages modern web development techniques to [mention a key feature or functionality] and focuses on [mention the core topics or problems it addresses]. This repository serves as the codebase for the entire project.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This repository, built using HTML and Python, provides a project demonstrating map visualization techniques. It focuses on displaying geographical data on interactive maps, potentially incorporating data analysis and user-friendly interfaces for exploring and understanding spatial information.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built using Python (Flask) for the backend, PostgreSQL for the database, and HTML/CSS for the frontend, demonstrating a complete project implementation. It provides functionalities for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data, offering a practical example of integrating different technologies within a modern web application development context. The repository serves as a learning resource showcasing best practices and a working example of a Python-based web application with database interaction.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX and HTML source code for my resume, showcasing my skills and experience in a professionally designed and easily customizable format. It serves as a project demonstrating my proficiency in document preparation with TeX and web development with HTML.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a web application built with TypeScript, Vite.js, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API to provide interactive and engaging AI-powered conversations. This project demonstrates practical application of modern web technologies and AI integration, focusing on creating a user-friendly interface with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for seamless communication with the Gemini API through a robust TypeScript backend.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: This dynamic-event-calendar repository provides a fully functional, interactive event calendar built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to easily view, add, and manage events directly within the calendar interface, offering a customizable and user-friendly experience for project scheduling and event planning.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a Next.js-based project for IoT asset tracking, leveraging TypeScript, CSS (with Tailwind CSS), and JavaScript for a modern and responsive user interface. It utilizes Supabase for backend services and database management, offering a comprehensive solution for visualizing and managing the location and status of IoT-connected assets.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a project showcasing a dynamic and interactive web experience built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.  This repository focuses on implementing modern front-end techniques to create an engaging and user-friendly application, potentially exploring concepts related to [mention a key feature or theme from the README, if applicable, e.g., interactive maps, data visualization, or game mechanics].

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a modern e-commerce web application built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI), showcasing a clean and intuitive interface for browsing and purchasing fresh fruits. Leveraging React Query for efficient data fetching and management, this project demonstrates best practices for building performant and type-safe web applications using the `pages` router. Explore this repository for inspiration and implementation examples in the realm of modern e-commerce development.
